title: CalendarView heading: add one-sentence description under title

requirements.summary: Add a short, muted, single-sentence description directly beneath the CalendarView h2 heading text without changing any other elements.
acceptanceCriteria: The selected h2 renders a primary heading line and a second line of smaller, muted description text immediately beneath it.
The description is a single short English sentence explaining what the calendar/journey page does.
Only the selected h2 element is modified; no other layout elements (e.g., button placement/size) are changed in this build.
